channel.title: Shit goes down at our school
channel.description:
[img]http://screensnapr.com/e/oqaji4.png[/img]
Last day of school, did it during the night to 10 rooms xd
As well as tie 12 year old first years who were stupid enugh to believe free candy to poles with duck tape.

item.title: Shit goes down at our school
item.dc:creator: @n10si_t n10si t
item.description:
@n10si_t wrote:

The Reaper X:

Also, I the down just up the street from mine is rich as fuck and they run a highschool that is so big in population that they have to supply extra dormancy for certain classrooms, such as trailers and stuff. I’m assuming that’s something like what those are.

what?

Read full topic

item.title: Shit goes down at our school
item.dc:creator: @Jamie1200 Jamie1200
item.description:
@Jamie1200 wrote:

Davidi2:

Do you say that because I confirmed what TRX said against what you said? Because that wasn’t meant to insult you in anyway (and even just 5 or 10 years ago what you said probably would have been correct, Digital Revolution baby!)

Totally. <3
5-10 Years ago, I would have never have come here, If i’d known that id get sucked into the Moparcrowd.

Read full topic

item.title: Shit goes down at our school
item.dc:creator: @Jamie1200 Jamie1200
item.description:
@Jamie1200 wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:22, topic:415499”]@ Jamie - Like TRX said, third world country doesn’t mean they live in huts and eat beetles with no form of technology. Almost everywhere has some sort of internet now (I didn’t believe it myself until my mom went on a trip to Cambodia, into the remote villages [for her job], and told me they have internet there)

Point 1 - Duct taping some kid to a pole is really retarded, and I have an urge to punch your face to be quite honest.
Point 2 - If you had to break in to grab the chairs and stuff, I really hope you get arrested.
Point 3 - It’s not even that funny, considering it’s one of those things where it takes longer or just as long to do, than it takes to fix.[/quote]
I used to admire you, You went over to the Mopartards and completely changed.

Read full topic
item.source: Shit goes down at our school

item.title: Shit goes down at our school
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

@ Jamie - Like TRX said, third world country doesn’t mean they live in huts and eat beetles with no form of technology. Almost everywhere has some sort of internet now (I didn’t believe it myself until my mom went on a trip to Cambodia, into the remote villages [for her job], and told me they have internet there)

Point 1 - Duct taping some kid to a pole is really retarded, and I have an urge to punch your face to be quite honest.
Point 2 - If you had to break in to grab the chairs and stuff, I really hope you get arrested.
Point 3 - It’s not even that funny, considering it’s one of those things where it takes longer or just as long to do, than it takes to fix.

Read full topic

item.title: Shit goes down at our school
item.dc:creator: @Jamie1200 Jamie1200
item.description:
@Jamie1200 wrote:

[quote=“Jc22493, post:20, topic:415499”][quote author=Jamie1200 link=topic=517444.msg3759958#msg3759958 date=1316790102]

lol third world country education at its finest.

Yes ofc third world country. That’s why he has enough money for electricity, a computer and have it cabled in for internet access.

…do you know the meaning of third world…?

No JC im a fucktard. /nosarcasmintended
[/quote]

There we go.[/quote]
har har >.>

Read full topic

Also, I the down just up the street from mine is rich as fuck and they run a highschool that is so big in population that they have to supply extra dormancy for certain classrooms, such as trailers and stuff. I’m assuming that’s something like what those are.
